mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NO, O.USER_NO, O.ORDER_TITLE, O.ORDER_CONTENT, O.CATEGORY_MAIN, O.ALERT_FRAGILE, O.ALERT_VALUABLE, O.ALERT_URGENT, O.START_POINT, O.END_POINT, O.CREATE_DATE, O.ORDER_STATUS, O.DISTANCE, O.PRICE, O.START_DATE, O.END_DATE FROM ORDERS O LEFT JOIN USERS U ON O.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE O.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
